description.value: Your body is exceptionally conducive to the flow of aether, and manipulating magic is in your blood. Choose one common cantrip from the @Localize[PF2E.TraitArcane] spell list. You can cast this spell as a @Localize[PF2E.TraitArcane] innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. You can change this cantrip to a different one from the same list once per day by studying magical texts and scrolls; this is a 10-minute activity that has the concentrate trait.
